entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Indian Head
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:09 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Indian Head AAFC 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -11.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -12.8°C
Wind: ENE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow this evening and ending overnight then cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h near noon. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
